Key Match Events: Lautaro Martinez scored a brace in Argentina's 2-0 victory over Peru
Miguel Araujo was suspended for Peru due to a red card against Canada
Pre-Game Insights: Argentina have not lost any of their previous 16 meetings with Peru
Peru must claim maximum points to have any chance of escaping the group stage
Post-Match Reflections: Argentina boss Scaloni confirmed that changes will be made to his starting lineup
Legendary attacker Lionel Messi was ruled out of the match due to a hamstring injury
Miscellaneous Highlights: Paolo Guerrero needs one more strike to equal the late Teodoro Fernandez for the most goals scored by a Peruvian in the tournament's history
Argentina became the first nation to secure their spot in the quarter-finals of the 2024 Copa America
